article: the explosion evoked images of beirut , not oklahoma , but people who have spent years monitoring extremism in the united states say that what happened in oklahoma city on april ## differs only in magnitude , not in kind , from a steady , nationwide drumbeat of right-wing violence that has been building for more than a decade .
